name: Detective Dog: Sticky Burning Justice
description:
Video: https://youtu.be/3DSOnWlTeUs

 Theme: Sticky Justice, Burn it down.

 Achievement : Maverick, Block  chain, 3-bit color 

Controls:

W / up arrow - move up

S/ down arrow - moves down

A/ left arrow moves left

D/ right arrow - moves right

spacebar - shoot

Kill red guys and do not shoot green and burn as much stuff down as you can, everything but the road  will burn down.
